title: "Unable to connect to the login que"
body: Is anyone else getting this when trying to login? Ive changed password and reinstalled game

replies.body: We're currently aware of the issue, and [we're tracking it in this thread](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/GNIFyg6h-login-issues-july-13th?comment=0006). There's a list of things that will help us to troubleshoot the problem - could you check that out and post in that thread with your results?
Hit me with it zaps lad, what you need ?

If you can check out this post [here](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/GNIFyg6h-login-issues-july-13th?comment=0006) - it'll have the relevant stuff. We're currently identifying the problem and may add more troubleshooting steps, so it's best to check out that post directly!
Riot knows about it, we've just got to wait now.
Theres a login issue my dude, gotta wait for the lads riot to sort it out, mans trying to grind that solo q int, need to get out of diamond 4
